name: BibleinOneYear
0:
”Alexa, open Bible inOne Year”
”Alexa, ask Bible inOne Year for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Bible inOne Year”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible inone year
des:
Listen to a daily bible reading from Psalm or Proverbs, the New Testament and Old Testament, plus amazing commentary from Nicky Gumbel, pioneer of Alpha International, to walk you through each day’s scriptures. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." You can also ask for previous episodes by saying "Alexa, previous". 

The Bible in One Year commentary was introduced in 2011 as a daily email for HTB congregation members. Now, BiOY has a worldwide following with over 3 million users on the popular mobile app. Nicky Gumbel is Vicar of Holy Trinity Brompton (HTB), an Anglican church in central London, UK. He is the pioneer of Alpha, an 11-session introduction to the Christian faith, now running all over the world. Nicky has written a number of bestselling books, including "Questions of Life", "The Jesus Lifestyle", "Searching Issues" and "Why Jesus?" He is married to Pippa. They live in central London and have three grown-up children.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
